name: Crypt Slayer | Tombs of the damned
name_original: Crypt Slayer | Tombs of the damned
description:
You have been hired to clean out an ancient tomb used by the kingdom to store the bodies of soldiers.

Cultists seem to have used dark magic to resurrect souls and bodies. Something we cannot allow!
Stop these cultists so the dead can rest once more and the kingdom can stay safe for a while longer.

Crypt Slayer | Tombs of the damned is a small game i've made over the past few weeks. It is a pet project that i'd like to share with everyone!

The DEMO includes the story mode which is a short introduction to the game with handmade levels. The full game can be bought and includes endless mode. Randomly generated levels for even more hack and slash enjoyment!
